description:
Kanata`s past with Keisetsu is revealed. Grimoire hires a mercenary Buddyfighter to represent Grimoire Park. Meanwhile, monsters all over Cho-Tokyo begin to act strangely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakuten no Chikara! Tenshou Ryuu Aldo Athora!!
The Power of Overturn! Heavenly Crystal Dragon, Aldo Athora!
逆天の力! 天晶竜アルドアトラ!!
